Title: Establishes "Brendan's law"; requires cordless window coverings in child day care centers and certain other facilities
Summary: Establishes "Brendan's law"; requires child day care centers and certain other facilities installing new or replacement window coverings to install cordless window coverings; requires child day care centers and certain other facilities that have window coverings in place before the effective date of this section to meet safety standards established in ANSI/WCMA A 100.1-2012 or any successor standard.
LawCode: Add ยง390-m, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing Brendan's law; and to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring cordless window coverings in child day care centers and certain other facilities
